    • Units of measurement

Data attach utilities

attach_src.Rd

Attaching a data source sets up an environment containing prt::new_prt() files using base::delayedAssign().

data

as_src_tbl(x, ...)

# S3 method for src_tbl
as_src_tbl(x, ...)

# S3 method for src_env
as_src_tbl(x, tbl, ...)

# S3 method for character
as_src_tbl(x, env, ...)

as_src_env(x)

# S3 method for src_env
as_src_env(x)

# S3 method for character
as_src_env(x)

# S3 method for default
as_src_env(x)

# S3 method for src_tbl
as_src_env(x)

attach_src(x, ...)

# S3 method for src_cfg
attach_src(x, assign_env = .GlobalEnv, dir = src_data_dir(x), ...)

# S3 method for character
attach_src(x, name = "data-sources", file = NULL, assign_env = .GlobalEnv, ...)

setup_src_env(x, env, dir = NULL)

# S3 method for src_cfg
setup_src_env(x, env, dir = src_data_dir(x))

Arguments

x

Data source to attach
...

Forwarded to further calls to attach_src()
tbl

String valued table name
env

Environment where data proxy objects are created
assign_env

Environment in which the data source will become available
dir

Directory used to look for fst::fst() files; NULL calls data_dir() using the source name as subdir argument
name

String valued name of a config file which will be looked up in the default config directors
file

Full file name to load

Format

An object of class environment of length 5.

Contents

Developed by Nicolas Bennett, Drago Plecko, Ida-Fong Ukor.
